column2: and found this place after some research. There was a long wait
column3: so we decided to eat outside
column4: where the wait was much shorter.  The food was great!  I never had grits before
column6: so the waiter brought me a sample.  Nice sized portions
column7: very tasty.  Hash browns had unique taste
column8: unlike traditional fries. Bacon was ok
column10: but the eggs were filling and unique.
